description:
As the New Year approaches, Yamada and Kosuda slip out of their clothes and into a bed at the local love motel! Lust is in the air, but it’s kind of hard to make out over the sound of that ambulance!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bokura no Tame ni Sekai wa Mawaru Sayonara... B Gata H Kei / Tenshi ni Natta Yamada! Saraba! B Gata H Kei!!
Die Welt dreht sich für uns
The World Revolves for Us! Goodbye... B Gata H Kei! - Yamada Turns Into an Angel! Farewell! B Gata H Kei!
僕らのために世界は回る さよなら... B型H系 / 天使になった山田! さらば! B型H系!!
